name: Puzzle Wiz
description:
Puzzle Wiz is an original 3D puzzle game from the creators of Catapult King®.

On a quest to create a new colour, one Wizard accidentally created a whole new Dimension! Solve each puzzle and help Merlin escape an enchanted 3D realm in Puzzle Wiz - A Colour Match Adventure.

Set in an enchanted world high up in the clouds, this character driven adventure is a puzzle game like no other. Can you solve each puzzle and find a way forward?

• MASTER THE ART OF MAGIC!
The brightest of Wizards are known to experiment with new forms of Magic, but even magical experiments can go horribly wrong! This time Merlin has shattered the Master Rainbow and each colour was sent spiralling into a new Dimension. Now he needs your help to restore colour to the world and find a way Home!

• EXPLORE NEW WORLDS
Explore magical 3D worlds and cast spells to change the colour of any tile blocking your way. Connect tiles of the same colour to release the essence and clear a path through 100 spellbinding Levels. The better you are at problem solving, the more experience you gain to level up your character.

• LEVEL UP!
Level up Merlin to unlock game changing abilities! You can use ALCHEMY to make gold while you’re away, upgrade your SPIRIT SIGHT to reach higher scores, and gain extra time on timed levels with the TIME TURNER. Brilliant!

• CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER
Collect gold stars to participate in mini game events and spend your coins on upgrades, pets, staffs, and outfits to customize Merlin’s look. Complete quests to earn bonus rewards, and summon pets to help you out of tricky situations as you journey from an Apprentice to a fully-fledged Puzzle Wizard.

Puzzle Wiz is completely free to play and some game items may also be purchased with real money.

*****

FEATURES:

• Stunning 3D graphics
• 100+ spellbinding Levels
• Immersive worlds to explore, including: Magic Forest, Candy Island & Sunset Valley.
• Unique colour match gameplay inspired by match 3
• Level up your character
• Customize your outfit
• Summon pets and activate magic boosters.
• Learn new skills and upgrade your abilities.
• Win fantastic prizes!

*****

Download Puzzle Wiz and start your adventure today. It's Free to Play!
